languages.text: "Есть у меня предположение, но… я пока сам в него не верю. Слишком маловероятно, слишком опасно. Однако я охотно выслушаю ваши мысли на счет происходящего".
"I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."
languages.original_text: "Есть у меня предположение, но… я пока сам в него не верю. Слишком маловероятно, слишком опасно. Однако я охотно выслушаю ваши мысли на счет происходящего".

traits.locale_text: "I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time. It is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."
"I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time. It is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."
"I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."
"I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."
"I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."
"I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."

languages.text: 「ひとつの仮説はありますが…現時点ではあまり信ぴょう性があるとは思っていません。あまりにも突飛で、危険すぎるので。ですが、あなたの見解についてはぜひ聞かせていただきたい」
languages.original_text: "I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつの仮説はありますが…現時点ではあまり信ぴょう性があるとは思っていません。あまりにも突飛で、危険すぎるので。ですが、あなたの見解についてはぜひ聞かせていただきたい」

languages.text: "Ja, die habe ich, aber ... ich halte im Moment selbst nicht viel davon – zu unwahrscheinlich und zu gefährlich. Allerdings wäre ich sehr gespannt auf Eure Sichtweise der Ereignisse."
languages.original_text: "I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, die habe ich, aber ... ich halte im Moment selbst nicht viel davon – zu unwahrscheinlich und zu gefährlich. Allerdings wäre ich sehr gespannt auf Eure Sichtweise der Ereignisse."

languages.text: « J'ai une théorie, mais... Je la trouve peu plausible, au vu des éléments dont nous disposons. Cependant, je serais ravi d'entendre vos propres suppositions. »
languages.original_text: "I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai une théorie, mais... Je la trouve peu plausible, au vu des éléments dont nous disposons. Cependant, je serais ravi d'entendre vos propres suppositions. »

languages.text: «Tengo una teoría, pero... ni yo mismo termino de creérmela, es demasiado improbable y harto peligrosa. No obstante, estaré encantado de oír su propia opinión sobre estos sucesos».
languages.original_text: "I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo una teoría, pero... ni yo mismo termino de creérmela, es demasiado improbable y harto peligrosa. No obstante, estaré encantado de oír su propia opinión sobre estos sucesos».

languages.text: “我想到了某个可能性，只是……我并不太相信这种假设，因为它实在是太不现实，也太危险了。不过，我很愿意听听你对这些事情的看法。”
languages.original_text: "I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."

traits.locale_text: “我想到了某个可能性，只是……我并不太相信这种假设，因为它实在是太不现实，也太危险了。不过，我很愿意听听你对这些事情的看法。”

languages.text: "Bir tahminim var ama... Şu anda ben de pek emin değilim. Fazla düşük bir ihtimal ve aşırı tehlikeli. Ancak bu olaylarla ilgili başka fikirleri de memnuniyetle dinlemek isterim."
languages.original_text: "I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."

traits.locale_text: "Bir tahminim var ama... Şu anda ben de pek emin değilim. Fazla düşük ihtimal ve aşırı tehlikeli. Ancak bu olaylarla ilgili sizin fikrinizi de memnuniyetle dinlemek isterim."

languages.original_text: "I have a theory, but... I myself give it little credit at this time — it is too unlikely and too dangerous. However, I will gladly listen to your own perspective on these events."
